abstract: HSBC, the giant London-based bank, has moved its North American headquarters to a sprawling facility that it bills as carbon neutral in the hamlet of Mettawa, about 30 miles north of Chicago.
lead_paragraph: HSBC, the giant London-based bank, has moved its North American headquarters to a sprawling facility that it bills as carbon neutral in the hamlet of Mettawa, about 30 miles north of Chicago.

headline.main: HSBC Thinks Green With New North American Headquarters
